body.p: You can find an overview of all innovations on the documentation site "Was ist neu?". A detailed list of changes is provided in the Changelog. This is a long term support release (LTS), so we support this version for one year.

If you have your application already near version 2017.06, you only have to update your pom.xml (docportal/config):
[...] <groupId>org.mycore</groupId> <artifactId>application-model</artifactId> <version>2017.06.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> [...] <dependency> <groupId>org.mycore</groupId> <artifactId>mycore-complete</artifactId> <version>[2017.06.0.1-SNAPSHOT,2017.06.1)</version> <optional>false</optional> </dependency> [...]
In the next step you have to build your application again (ant resolve create.jar create.scripts create.webapp).
This page is currently under construction. See you again soon!
